Actions.Text:
-- "Try" is used, because the setting of "theTabPath" fails if the active Finder tab is a Smart Foldertry	tell application "Finder"		tell front window			set theActiveTabPath to POSIX path of (target of it as text)		end tell	end tell
return theActiveTabPathon error	return ""end try

Actions.ActionName: Remove trailing slash (/) and use tilde (~)
